Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/senior-data-scientist-netvagas-JV_IC2490130_KO0,21_KE22,30.htm?jl=1009122976160",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&s=344&guid=0000018dd8d677b7aca4583814bf3ecf&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&cs=1_fb75d70e&cb=1708739950647&jobListingId=1009122976160&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hncdctui2ejk001,2024-02-12,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Senior data scientist,Netvagas,Campinas,SP,,,,,1009122976160,"Descrição:
Share People Hub in partnership with AB InBev Growth Group - BEES, search for Senior Data Scientist for a Hybrid role in Campinas/SP.
About us

AB InBev is the leading global brewer and one of the world’s top 5 consumer product companies. With over 500 beer brands, we’re number one or two in many of the world’s top beer markets, including North America, Latin America, Europe, Asia, and Africa.
About ABI Growth Group

ABI’s Growth Division is the center of innovation and tech development within ABI, which is driving ABI’s growth by developing innovations for the core beer business and creating new hyper-growth tech businesses.

ABI Growth includes the following business lines: BEES (our business-to-business e-commerce and SaaS business, also focused on new technologies), TaDa and Ze Delivery (our direct-to-consumer e-commerce businesses), and several other high-tech divisions, including fintech and venture capital.
What you ll do:

Collaborate with team members to analyze complex datasets, develop and implement cutting-edge machine learning and deep learning algorithms for portfolio optimization, recommendations, personalization, promos, segmentation, imputation, and insights discovery.

Stay up to date with the latest advancements in machine learning and deep learning algorithms, ensuring a strong technical foundation to solve complex business problems. Apply frontier algorithms to drive innovation across the team s projects.

Utilize cloud platforms like Azure, Databricks, and Spark to efficiently process and analyze large-scale datasets. Leverage the full potential of these platforms to deliver scalable and performant solutions.
Utilize Python/PySpark for data manipulation, analysis, and modeling tasks. Implement automation workflows to streamline processes and enhance productivity using tools and frameworks.

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, business stakeholders, and product managers, to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions. Embrace an agile development approach to iterate quickly and efficiently.
What you ll need:
Bachelor s degree in computer science, engineering, mathematics, or any quantitative field. A master s degree is a plus.

Strong technical skills and deep understanding of frontier algorithms in machine learning and deep learning. Familiarity with techniques for portfolio optimization, recommendations, personalization, promos, segmentation, imputation, and insights discovery.
Proficiency in machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch. Experience in implementing and deploying models using these frameworks.

Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/senior-supply-chain-data-scientist-grundfos-holding-as-JV_KO0,34_KE35,54.htm?jl=1009098723749",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&s=344&guid=0000018dd8c62a1aa0325ab59ff886e4&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&cs=1_de7d1dc0&cb=1708738882204&jobListingId=1009098723749&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hncccai0jg8o801,2024-01-30,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Senior Supply Chain Data Scientist,Grundfos Holding A/S,,,,,,,1009098723749,"Application Deadline:
Workplace: Hybrid Position
Location:
Indjija, RS, 22320

Employment Type: Regular
Become a part of our journey to make AI part of Sales planning in Grundfos
Would you like to entrepreneur and develop advanced AI data models to strengthen and supporting our planning further?
What is the job about?

Do you want to join the journey in developing AI in Grundfos forecasting. The process will be focused on experimenting, piloting, and bringing new models into operational execution. As a Senior Data scientist, you’ll be placed in the Global Forecasting team but over time not only working with implementing AI / ML forecasting models but planning models in general. You’ll be responsible for guaranteeing that we explore, pilot and implement the right advance models for optimizing our supply chain. As a data scientist, you’ll start by supporting a project to promote our statistical forecast accuracy higher across Grundfos value chains – both by introducing new models and data sources.
You will be placed in a team committed to optimizing, develop and govern Grundfos sales planning process covering both the SIOP horizon (0 – 18 month), and the strategic horizon (up to 5 years).
Your main responsibilities:
Responsible for AI model Capabilities and tools:
Pioneer AI forecast model development in Grundfos
Support define Grundfos’ Global Forecasting and Planning AI roadmap
Define the standards for incorporating AI in planning
Collaborate with the IT department regarding governess of AI models
Collaborate with other relevant departments withing Grundfos that develops advanced models
Collect requirements from the different areas within Global Planning teams around their requirements
Develop and monitor model performances / benefits and identify potential further areas of developments.
Your background:
Degree in data science, statistics, computer science, supply chain or similar.
At least 1 year of experience in similar positions
Experience developing models from PoC to MVP and production solution
Some knowledge of MLOps, DevOps and related cloud services/technologies for deployment of ML solutions
Expertise in Python (including standard libraries like pandas, numpy, scipy, TensorFlow and SQL
Storytelling skills to help translate business problems to data science problems and bring data science solutions to the business in a clear way
Good communicational skills in English in both speech and writing.

As a person you are have good communication skills and can translate Data Technical language to a non-data technical stakeholder. Your eye for detail is high and you are goal oriented. Your ability to communicate is shown in your collaboration methods which are holistic and kind, and you thrive in presenting your knowledge to others. You have a business understanding and can see how the solution fit in the overall picture. It is a prerequisite that your English is fluent, both in writing and in speech.
What’s in it for you?

What are your goals? Here at Grundfos it’s our mission to enable you develop and fulfil your aspirations, both career and personal. We are guided by our six core values, and you’ll find that your fresh ideas will be welcomed and make a difference in everything from local to large-scale global projects. You’ll encounter colleagues from all over the world both as part of your daily work, supporting and all the while broadening each other’s cultural horizons.
In addition, your day-to-day benefits include:
Annual bonuses
Private medical assurance
Hybrid working policy with organized transportation to work or compensation for fuel costs

A gym that can be used before and after working hours as well as other sports activities like football, table football, basketball etc.
Discount of employee purchase of Grundfos products
Long-term career development with regular dialogue, as well as continuous learning and development opportunities.

If this job sounds appealing, please send your resume and cover letter by clicking “Apply”.
We look forward to hearing from you.

Grundfos is one of the world’s leading water technology companies with more than 19.000 employees in 60+ countries all over the world. Our skills commit us to pioneering solutions to the world’s water and climate challenges and improve the quality of life for people. We dare to do things that others cannot or dare not do, as we believe innovation is not only a business opportunity, but an obligation. And what really matters to us is not short term profit, but the impact we make. By becoming part of our united powerful team, you too can drive this change no matter your role.
An inclusive team

JOB TITLE: Sr Data Scientist

Syneos Health is the only fully integrated biopharmaceutical solutions organization purpose-built to accelerate customer success. We lead with a product development mindset, seamlessly connecting our capabilities to add high-value insights to speed therapies to patients and provide practical value to help our customers achieve their objectives.

Every day we perform better because of how we work together, as one team, each the best at what we do. We bring many talented experts together across a wide range of business-critical services that support our business. Every role within Corporate is vital to furthering our vision of Shortening the Distance from Lab to Life®.
Discover what our 30,000 employees, across 110 countries already know:
WORK HERE MATTERS EVERYWHERE
Why Syneos Health

#SyneosHealthLife means we’re committed to our Total Self-culture – where everyone can authentically be themselves. Our Total Self-culture is what unites us globally, and we know every person’s unique contributions make a difference.

We believe our success is a direct result of the people who are driving it – you! We value your dedication to caring for our customers and patients, so we want to focus on taking care of you. That’s why we offer a comprehensive benefits program encompassing your total health - physical, mental, and financial.

We are continuously building the company we all want to work for and our customers want to work with. Why? Because when we bring together diversity of thoughts, backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives – we’re able to create a place where everyone feels like they belong.
JOB SUMMARY

Within Technology and Intelligent Solutions our strength is the efficiency with which we deliver leading-edge products and support to those we serve. We’re proud to set the standard for success in our industry. The Senior Data Scientist supports our business goals by providing timely delivery of high-quality data science solutions and innovative products.
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

Facilitate the integration of Syneos Health's machine learning, simulations models, and advanced analytical techniques into clinical trials, with the objective to achieve real-world outcomes including acceleration, risk mitigation, and cost reduction.
Design and maintain code, algorithms, documentation, and related assets in a precise and sustainable manner.
Collaborate with subject matter and technical experts to strategize analyses, utilize existing algorithms/tools, and derive actionable insights.
Ensure that outputs, including data visualization and associated messaging, are of consistent high quality and ready for client presentation.
Collect feedback from the application of models, contributing to model refinement and the development of innovative tools/features.
Undertake other relevant duties as necessary. Limited travel may be required (up to 25%).
Qualifications
QUALIFICATION REQUIREMENTS
Possession of a Master's or Ph.D. degree or equivalent professional experience, with a significant focus on quantitative and computational analysis.

Extensive expertise in areas including machine learning, statistical modeling, simulation, and optimization. Additionally, must have substantial knowledge and expertise in at least one of the following: Deep Neural Networks, Probabilistic Programming and Bayesian methods, Causal Inference, Large Language Models, Optimization.
Comprehensive programming experience, specifically with Python and its machine learning libraries, SQL, and git.
Adherence to best practices for crafting maintainable and modular code.
Acquaintance with cloud platforms (e.g., AzureML), distributed computing, and big data technologies is a plus.
Stellar data visualization capabilities complemented by a knack for data-driven storytelling.
Superlative verbal, written, and visual communication skills.
Acute problem-solving acumen, combined with critical thinking and a history of devising innovative solutions to intricate challenges.
Proven experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams, overseeing multiple projects concurrently, and ensuring timely results.
A foundation in life sciences or healthcare is advantageous
column2: a fervent interest in enhancing patient lives is indispensable.

column1: Years of experience required: Six (6) – Eight (8) years of experience
Working hours: Willingness to work Eastern hours

At Syneos Health, we believe in providing an environment and culture in which Our People can thrive, develop and advance. We reward and recognize our people by providing valuable benefits and a quality-of-life balance. The benefits for this position include a company car or car allowance, Health benefits to include Medical, Dental and Vision, Company match 401k, eligibility to participate in Employee Stock Purchase Plan, Eligibility to earn commissions/bonus based on company and individual performance, and flexible paid time off (PTO) and sick time. Because certain states and municipalities have regulated paid sick time requirements, eligibility for paid sick time may vary depending on where you work. Syneos complies with all applicable federal, state, and municipal paid sick time requirements.

The annual base salary for this position ranges from $102,600 to $178,600. The base salary range represents the anticipated low and high of the Syneos Health range for this position. Actual salary will vary based on various factors such as the candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies, and proficiency for the role.
Get to know Syneos Health
Over the past 5 years, we have worked with 94% of all Novel FDA Approved Drugs, 95% of EMA Authorized Products and over 200 Studies across 73,000 Sites and 675,000+ Trial patients.
No matter what your role is, you’ll take the initiative and challenge the status quo with us in a highly competitive and ever-changing environment. Learn more about Syneos Health.
Additional Information:

Tasks, duties, and responsibilities as listed in this job description are not exhaustive. The Company, at its sole discretion and with no prior notice, may assign other tasks, duties, and job responsibilities. Equivalent experience, skills, and/or education will also be considered so qualifications of incumbents may differ from those listed in the Job Description. The Company, at its sole discretion, will determine what constitutes as equivalent to the qualifications described above. Further, nothing contained herein should be construed to create an employment contract. Occasionally, required skills/experiences for jobs are expressed in brief terms. Any language contained herein is intended to fully comply with all obligations imposed by the legislation of each country in which it operates, including the implementation of the EU Equality Directive, in relation to the recruitment and employment of its employees. The Company is committed to compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act, including the provision of reasonable accommodations, when appropriate, to assist employees or applicants to perform the essential functions of the job.

Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/sr-lead-data-scientist-datacloud-team-adp-JV_IC2417359_KO0,37_KE38,41.htm?jl=1008879557106",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&s=344&guid=0000018dd8d7e28b89a6183e0c9c9519&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&cs=1_f2e54191&cb=1708740043523&jobListingId=1008879557106&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hncdfolhk2m1801,2024-02-20,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Sr Lead Data Scientist - DataCloud Team,ADP,Porto Alegre,RS,,,,,1008879557106,"ADP is hiring a Lead Data Scientist.
Does the thought of working with one of the most comprehensive employment data sets excite you?
Are you inspired by transformation and making an impact on the lives of millions of people every day?
Are you a technologist first and foremost who approaches every problem wearing that hat while going out of your way to champion creativity and build diverse, productive, and engaged teams?
Well, this may be the role for you. Ready to design what's next?

In this role, you'll acquire, clean, and analyze large data sets and do exploratory analysis to understand our data and check if it meets project requirements. Moreover, you'll be developing data products to make predictions and recommendations within ADP products. It's more than digits and dials - you're making huge decisions that impact millions of customers.

To thrive in this career, you should know how to identify errors and reactively fix them. You'll need to have some formal education in quantitative analytics and know design patterns and data structures. You have the skills to create new models using state-of-the-art technologies. You will coach and mentor junior data scientists with different strengths to solve various problems with different methodologies and analyses. Given the scale of our data sets and the complex problems we give you to solve, you will stay challenged and engaged with years of exciting projects ahead-all while growing your skills and progressing in a rewarding career.
Like what you see? Apply now!

ADP is a global leader in HR technology, offering the latest AI and machine learning-enhanced payroll, tax, HR, benefits, and much more. We believe our people make all the difference in cultivating an inclusive, down-to-earth culture that welcomes ideas, encourages innovation, and values belonging. ADP has a deep commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion as a global Best Places to Work, DiversityInc® Top 50 Company, Best CEO and company for women, LGBTQ+, multicultural talent, and more. Learn more about ADP's commitment on our YouTube channel: http://adp.careers/DEI_Videos

ADP DataCloud is a powerful solution that encompasses Reporting, Analytics, and Benchmarks, which currently serves more than 50,000 ADP clients and is growing globally. ADP Reporting is a centralized reporting tool that serves dozens of ADP products, ADP Analytics provides our clients with key information and insights about their organizations, and ADP Benchmarks allow companies to see how they measure up against the market using anonymized aggregated data. DataCloud is key to ADP's strategy as it derives value from our most valuable asset: ADP's data, one of the richest and most unique datasets in the world. We are a geo-distributed (US, India, Brazil) team that intensively collaborates to build robust and user-centric solutions.

ADP Labs located in Porto Alegre, Brazil, provides software development and infrastructure for world-wide ADP products, working with large-scale initiatives across multiple geographies, including Brazil, the United States, and India. As an internationally distributed software development team, we are hiring a Lead Data Scientist for ADP DataCloud team.
WHAT YOU'LL DO:
Here's what you can expect on a typical day:

Advanced Analytics & Predictive Modeling. You formulate analytical problems, extract & analyze data from multiple systems, summarize critical findings/insights, and develop a compelling visual representation of analyses with actionable recommendations.

Team Collaboration. You're part of a collaborative team, listening to needs, then finding and sharing solutions. You're comfortable and skilled at presenting your projects and findings to both peers and leadership. You collaborate with product, design, and engineering teams to plan, design, develop and deploy high-impact data products supporting multiple products across ADP

Research & Development. You design and implement start-of-the-art data products, machine learning models, and systems to optimize the HCM system user experience. You continuously looking for new ways to leverage ADP data to create new products and services and find more insights. You are passionate about learning and applying new techniques within data science that leads to innovations.
Deliver at an epic scale. You write pristine code and documentation, champion and define best practices to produce highly adaptive, high-performing, continuous learning AI models/systems.
TO SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE:
Education. You have a bachelor's degree (OR equivalent) in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, or a related field.
Experience. You should have good experience of related experience in relevant skills gained and developed in the same or similar role.
Communication. You are an advanced English language speaker.

Technical skills. You have fluency in Python-including popular data science packages (pandas, sklearn, etc.), a strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and methods used for data science and machine learning, and familiarity with natural language processing.
MUST HAVE:
Master's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or a related field
Knowledge of generative and embedding models
Exposure to Databricks platform, MLflow, and/or Jupyter notebooks
Understanding of data products (recommender systems, classifiers, chatbots, etc.)
Acquaintance with AWS cloud solutions (S3, Glue, Lambda, SageMaker)
YOU'LL LOVE WORKING HERE BECAUSE YOU CAN:
Have courageous team collaboration. Courage comes from how associates are willing to have difficult conversations, speak up, be an owner, and challenge one another's ideas to find the best solution.

Be surrounded by curious learners. We align ourselves with other smart people in an environment where we grow and elevate one another to the next level. We encourage our associates to listen, stay agile, and learn from mistakes.

Act like an owner & doer. Mission-driven and committed to leading change, you will be encouraged to take on any challenge and solve complex problems. No tasks are beneath or too great for us. We are hands-on and willing to master our craft.

Give back to others. Always do the right thing for our clients and our community and humbly give back to the community where we live and work. Support our associates in times of need through ADP's Philanthropic Foundation.
Join a company committed to equality and equity. Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions.

Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP: ADP affirms that inequality is detrimental to our associates, our clients, and the communities we serve. Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions. Together, we unite for equality and equity. ADP is committed to equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic, including race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, or protected veteran status and will not discriminate against anyone on the basis of a disability. We support an inclusive workplace where associates excel based on personal merit, qualifications, experience, ability, and job performance.

Ethics at ADP: ADP has a long, proud history of conducting business with the highest ethical standards and full compliance with all applicable laws. We also expect our people to uphold our values with the highest level of integrity and behave in a manner that fosters an honest and respectful workplace. Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/sr-planning-data-scientist-crop-science-s%C3%A3o-paulo-sp-bayer-JV_IC2479061_KO0,52_KE53,58.htm?jl=1009137470793",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&s=344&guid=0000018dd8805fd38d14bfcd586a916b&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&cs=1_e491f033&cb=1708734308409&jobListingId=1009137470793&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hnc80nvaih3d801,2024-02-21,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Sr Planning Data Scientist / Crop Science / São Paulo - SP,Bayer,São Paulo,SP,,,,,1009137470793,"Sr Planning Data Scientist / Crop Science / São Paulo - SP
At Bayer, we work hard to make this company a better place for our employees - and the world a better place for everyone. ""Health for all, hunger for none."" That's our vision at Bayer.

At Bayer, Diversity & Inclusion is taken seriously, it is a non-negotiable value, and it is one of the strategic pillars of our organization. We believe that diverse teams foster greater innovation and contribute to a more creative and welcoming work environment, allowing employees to be who they really are and express their full potential.

That's why everyone is welcome at Bayer: men, women, non-binary, LGBTQIA+, transgender, white, black, disabled and from different generations. If you have any diversity markers, feel even more encouraged to apply for this position, we will be very happy to meet you!
MAIN PURPOSE:

This position will manage data structure, standardization, connectivity and visualization for the Global Breeding Long Range Plan process creating a demand, supply, financial and feasibility outlook canvasing multiple crops and regions. This role is critical to the Breeding organization to enable agile representation of crop strategies and operational success.
YOUR MISSION WILL BE TO:
Conceptualize, build, organize and support data structure to capture planning and financial demand for long range plans currently focused on 1-3 year outlook
Represent planning on system connectivity across crop science related to LRP forecast accuracy, data standardization and data connectivity

Transform data collection processes into valuable information enabling critical strategic decisions on the operational and financial future of crop science, influencing complex business challenge outcomes

Execute data mining, extraction and connection from various data source into a standard, simplified form across multiple Crop Science data platforms, including Velocity, Crop Science Warehouse, FTS, LUMOS, Data One, along with additional analytical models and systems
Developing sustainable, consumable, accurate, and impactful reporting on model inputs and outputs, business impact, and key performance indicators.
Present information in a clear, concise and consistent manner to a broad spectrum of organizational leaders using multiple automated systems such as Spotfire, PowerBI
Collaborate across Business, IT and Analytic partners to create a roadmap of data congruency and consistency
Data Wrangling – proficiency in handling imperfections in data and establishing processes to improve reliability
Enhance data collection procedures to include all relevant information from multiple sources and technologies
ARE YOU READY FOR THE POSITION?
Must have:
Bachelor’s degree with robust experience or Marster’s degree with robust of experience or Ph.D. in any of the following functional areas, Plant Breeding, Manufacturing, Planning, Seed Production
Programming Skills – knowledge of statistical programming languages like R, Python and database query languages like SQL, Hive, or Pig
Experience with Data Visualization tools such as Spotfire, Power BI, or Smartsheets
Demonstrated advanced problem-solving abilities.
Combine strong conceptual and analytical skills with the ability to motivate senior managers and cross organizational teams to collaborate
Ability to influence, persuade and collaboratively build relationships with internal and external customers as well as the ability to drive corrective action when necessary
Ability to lead projects of high complexity with limited direction
Strong attention to detail
Proficient with Microsoft Office tools
Fluency in English and Portuguese
Nice to have:
Experience in Breeding methodologies, Trait Integration or Genotyping
Working knowledge of machine learning methods and algorithms
Have a broad understanding of various disciplines and issues

Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/staff-data-scientist-netvagas-JV_IC2490130_KO0,20_KE21,29.htm?jl=1009122976320",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&s=344&guid=0000018dd8d55efeaa37433368499298&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&cs=1_d571e5bd&cb=1708739878763&jobListingId=1009122976320&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hncdanopir3t801,2024-02-12,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Staff data scientist,Netvagas,Campinas,SP,,,,,1009122976320,"Descrição:
Share People Hub in partnership with AB InBev Growth Group - BEES, search for Staff Data Scientist for a Hybrid role in Campinas/SP.
About us

AB InBev is the leading global brewer and one of the world’s top 5 consumer product companies. With over 500 beer brands, we’re number one or two in many of the world’s top beer markets, including North America, Latin America, Europe, Asia, and Africa.
About ABI Growth Group

ABI’s Growth Division is the center of innovation and tech development within ABI, which is driving ABI’s growth by developing innovations for the core beer business and creating new hyper-growth tech businesses.

ABI Growth includes the following business lines: BEES (our business-to-business e-commerce and SaaS business, also focused on new technologies), TaDa and Ze Delivery (our direct-to-consumer e-commerce businesses), and several other high-tech divisions, including fintech and venture capital.
What you ll do:

Lead and manage a team of data scientists, providing guidance, technical leadership, mentorship, and support to drive professional growth and foster a collaborative and high-performing team environment.

Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of data science projects related to portfolio optimization, recommendations, personalization, promos, segmentation, imputation, and insights discovery by setting clear objectives, allocating resources effectively, and ensuring timely and successful project completion.

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, product managers, and engineers, to understand project requirements and deliver impactful solutions that drive business growth and customer satisfaction.
Lead development and execution of comprehensive data science roadmap that supports business goals and strategies.
Lead development & implementation of new emerging analytics technologies and identifies technology-based business opportunities.
Stay close to industry releases and academic research and externally advances analytics brand via open-source contributions, conferences etc.
Foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement within the team.
Serve as technical expert, providing guidance on advanced analytics, machine learning, and statistical modeling techniques.
What you ll need:
PhD in computer science, statistics, applied mathematics, engineering, or other quantitative fields.
Deep experience in data science, with a focus on machine learning, statistical modeling, and data analysis in the CPG industry.
Strong technical skills in programming languages such as Python/PySpark, and expertise in data manipulation, visualization, and analysis.
In-depth knowledge of machine learning algorithms, frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch), and data science tools.
Strong knowledge of cloud computing platforms like Azure/AWS, and scaling platforms like Databricks/Spark is required. Knowledge of CI/CD tools like GitHub is required.

Demonstrated leadership skills with the ability to motivate and inspire a team. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels. Strong agile and growth mindset is required.
Proven experience in end-to-end machine learning and data science timely project delivery, including problem formulation, data preprocessing, modeling, evaluation, and deployment.
Strong understanding of the CPG industry, including familiarity with portfolio optimization, recommendations, personalization, promos, segmentation, imputation, and insights discovery.
What We Offer:

Attendance Bonus*
Private pension plan

Casual office and dress code
Days off*
Health, dental, and life insurance
Medicines discounts
Gympass partnership
Childcare subsidies

Newvalue partnership

School materials assurance
Language and training platforms

column1: #admengenharia

Somos uma empresa do Grupo Telefônica, líder em telecomunicações no Brasil. Trabalhamos com o propósito de Digitalizar para Aproximar pessoas, negócios e toda sociedade, construindo uma nação mais conectada e transformando a vida dos brasileiros. Buscamos ampliar a autonomia, a personalização e as escolhas em tempo real dos nossos clientes, colocando-os no comando da sua vida digital, com segurança e confiabilidade – tudo isso com a qualidade que só a Vivo tem.

Para que isso seja possível, lideramos um processo de transformação digital e estamos revolucionando a Vivo de dentro para fora. Implementamos metodologias ágeis por toda a empresa, buscando nos conectar com as formas mais inovadoras e colaborativas de se trabalhar. Acreditamos que o caminho para oferecer a melhor experiência ao nosso cliente começa pela boa experiência do nosso colaborador.

Acreditamos que a diversidade de pessoas, vivência, culturas, comportamentos, habilidades e atitudes é um diferencial, que reflete a sociedade em que vivemos. Temos um sólido programa interno, pautados nos pilares de Gênero, LGBTI+, Raça, PcD e 50+ para assegurar uma cultura mais inclusiva e um ambiente mais diverso e representativo.
Somos uma empresa de tecnologia, inspirada na diversidade e na inovação, que oferece espaço para todos, apoia e acolhe as diferenças.

Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/tech-lead-cientista-de-dados-big-data-JV_KO0,28_KE29,37.htm?jl=1009055259074",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&s=344&guid=0000018dd6cf66afaab78bd755c582e5&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&uido=00CFD74B9F4B662849D33E57418C608B&cs=1_b64e7b9e&cb=1708705933097&jobListingId=1009055259074&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hnbcupmcjqu8801,2024-02-02,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Tech Lead Cientista de Dados,Big Data,,,trabalho remoto,,,,1009055259074,"Somos a Big Data, líderes no Brasil em Inteligência Artificial aplicada a negócios, ajudando grandes clientes como Dexco, Haleon, Kimberly Clark, Eagle Rock, Liberty Coca-Cola, Nivea, Jonhson & Jonhson, Sanofi & Medley, Germed, Natura, Kraft Heinz, P&G, Nestlé, WP Lab, Colgate Palmolive, Banco Santander, Red Bull e muitos outros.
Estamos em um momento de expansão internacional e procuramos pessoas com sangue nos olhos, foco e mentalidade de inovação para nos ajudar nesse grande sonho, que é sermos líderes globais em IA.

Nosso Tech Lead Cientista de Dados é um profissional chave em equipes de desenvolvimento de Dados e Tecnologia. Desempenhará um papel crucial na criação de experiências personalizadas e na maximização do valor para o usuário através de recomendações inteligentes e eficazes. Sua função também é combinar habilidades técnicas sólidas com habilidades de liderança para orientar a equipe no desenvolvimento de soluções eficientes e de alta qualidade.
Responsabilidades e atribuições
Como Tech Lead Cientista de Dados, o que esperamos de você:
Projetar, implementar e aprimorar modelos de recomendação usando técnicas de machine learning e análise de dados
Utilizar algoritmos colaborativos, baseados em conteúdo, filtragem híbrida e outras abordagens para criar sistemas de recomendação eficazes
Coletar, analisar e interpretar grandes conjuntos de dados para identificar padrões e insights relevantes para a personalização de recomendações
Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com cientistas de dados e analistas de dados para obter informações sobre o comportamento do usuário
Desenvolver métricas e realizar análises de desempenho para avaliar a eficácia dos modelos de recomendação
Garantir que os sistemas de recomendação sejam escaláveis e mantenham um desempenho eficiente
Trabalhar em colaboração com o Product Owner para priorização e planejamento das demandas para o time
Orientar o time na execução das tarefas e resolução de impedimentos técnicos, buscando eficiência, agilidade e qualidade nas entregas
Direcionar o uso de ferramentas, frameworks e outras tecnologias pelo time.
Requisitos e qualificações
Experiência sólida em projetar, desenvolver e implementar modelos de recomendação
Conhecimento profundo em linguagens de programação como Python, e bibliotecas como scikit-learn, TensorFlow ou PyTorch
Familiaridade com tecnologias relacionadas a processamento de dados em larga escala, armazenamento de dados e ferramentas de big data
Capacidade de realizar análises profundas de dados para extrair insights valiosos
Habilidades excelentes de comunicação para trabalhar efetivamente em equipes multidisciplinares
Experiência em liderança técnica de times e/ou projetos de Ciência de Dados.
Informações adicionais
Ambiente informal, de muita troca e amizade
Pessoas apaixonadas pelo que fazem
Um aprendizado novo por dia
Local que está buscando seu melhor todos os dias
Crescimento e oportunidades mil oportunidades ao seu redor
Salário competitivo
Vale Refeição (Caju)
Auxilio Academia
Ajuda de Custo Home Office
Plano de Saúde
Vale Educação
PLR
Possibilidades de se tornar sócio/sócia da empresa :)

Somos a Big Data, líderes no Brasil em Inteligência Artificial aplicada a negócios, ajudando grandes clientes como Dexco, Haleon, Kimberly Clark, Eagle Rock, Liberty Coca-Cola, Nivea, Jonhson & Jonhson, Sanofi & Medley, Germed, Natura, Kraft Heinz, P&G, Nestlé, WP Lab, Colgate Palmolive, Banco Santander, Red Bull e muitos outros.
Estamos em um momento de expansão internacional e procuramos pessoas com sangue nos olhos, foco e mentalidade de inovação para nos ajudar nesse grande sonho, que é sermos líderes globais em IA.
O que fazemos?
Criamos produtos baseados em algoritmos de machine learning para resolver alguns dos problemas mais complexos de toda grande empresa:
Quanto cobrar por cada produto em cada cliente?""
Quais produtos vender para quem?""
Como investir a verba de marketing?""
Quanto desconto dar para aumentar as vendas?""
Onde abrir a próxima unidade?""
Ou seja, vivemos a operação de grandes mercados no mundo implementando uma visão mais estratégica e holística baseada em dados.

E para quem pensou no termo ""consultoria"", importante destacar que não somos uma consultoria, somos executores. Nossos produtos rodam nas operações dos clientes e nós continuamos responsáveis pelos resultados e em mudar o mercado com eles, dia após dia.

Viver o desafio dos nossos clientes, desde suas construções até os resultados finais, é nossa motivação!","['TensorFlow', 'Big data', 'Machine learning', 'Data science', 'AI', 'Leadership', 'Communication skills', 'Python']"

Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/vaga-afirmativa-para-mulheres-cientista-de-dados-pleno-s%C3%AAnior-digitizei-informatica-ltda-JV_IC2438708_KO0,61_KE62,88.htm?jl=1009111917469",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&tgt=APPLY_START&s=344&guid=0000018dd8b2d08eabcbe2f306569750&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&ea=1&cs=1_e9a18872&cb=1708737614079&jobListingId=1009111917469&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hncb5k5ej3t6801,2024-02-05,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Vaga afirmativa para mulheres - Cientista de Dados (Pleno/Sênior).,DIGITIZEI INFORMATICA LTDA,Santo Antônio da Platina,PR,,,,,1009111917469,"Somos uma startup dinâmica de contru-tech com sede em Austin, EUA, atuando em vendas e capacitação de inteligência para fabricantes de produtos direcionados a empresas de construção. Nossa plataforma foi projetada para transformar a forma como os produtos de construção são vendidos e trazer insights abrangentes para a indústria da construção. À medida que embarcamos em nossa jornada para nos tornarmos uma potência de vendas e insights, estamos procurando um Cientista de Dados talentoso para se juntar à nossa equipe e contribuir para o crescimento e o sucesso de nossa plataforma inovadora.
RESPONSABILIDADES:
Colaborar estreitamente com as equipes existentes de Ciência de Dados e Engenharia de Produto para aprimorar e expandir a plataforma
column2: Participar de revisões de código e fornecer feedback construtivo para manter a qualidade e os padrões do código
column3: Demonstrar flexibilidade adaptando-se aos requisitos e tecnologias do projeto em evolução. Identifique e resolva proativamente desafios técnicos para garantir um processo de desenvolvimento tranquilo e eficiente
column4: Mantenha-se atualizado sobre as melhores práticas do setor e tecnologias emergentes para contribuir para a melhoria contínua de nossa pilha de tecnologia.

Machine LearningTer experiência com NLP

column4: Usado para versionar sistemas

column6: AWS (glue, sagemaker, s3)

column8: CI/CD
column9: Docker

column1: Glassdoor,"https://www.glassdoor.com.br/job-listing/visagio-talentos-formados-engenheiro-a-de-dados-remoto-h%C3%ADbrido-v-dev-JV_KO0,62_KE63,68.htm?jl=1009081061989",www.glassdoor.com.br/Vaga/index.htm/partner/jobListing.htm?pos=101&ao=1136043&s=344&guid=0000018dd8ed194e8d5a6e63a6dc4911&src=GD_JOB_VIEW&t=NS&vt=w&cs=1_ae7bb43e&cb=1708741433820&jobListingId=1009081061989&jrtk=5-yul1-3-1hnceq6b628gp001,2024-02-18,,2024-02-23,Cientista de dados,,Visagio Talentos - Formados: Engenheiro(a) de Dados [Remoto / Híbrido],v(dev),,,trabalho remoto,,,,1009081061989,"Destinado à graduados nos cursos de Ciência da Computação, Engenharias, Sistemas de Informação e afins, que desejam se desenvolver em projetos de Engenharia de Dados, Automação de Processos, Gestão de TI e Desenvolvimento de Software. Nosso time atua em contextos desafiadores em nossos clientes, com objetivo de gerar valor ao negócio através de tecnologia
Responsabilidades e atribuições
Criação, desenvolvimento e melhoramento de RPAs e pipeline de dados
Aprofundamento técnico em estudos na área de TI, como, cloud, banco de dados, versionamento
Experiência com novos conhecimentos como machine learning, artificial inteligence, etc
Acompanhamento e gestão de projetos através de metodologias ágeis, como Kanban, Scrum
Desenvolvimento interpessoal através de cursos, contato direto com clientes e trabalho em equipe.
Requisitos e qualificações
Estamos buscando pessoas com ou sem experiência, então fique tranquilo, nosso time está aqui para lhe ajudar na formação
Desejável conhecimento básico em metodologias ágeis, padrões de projeto e arquitetura de sistemas

Dado que atuamos em diferentes clientes e ambientes, não há nenhum requisito mínimo de conhecimento de stack, mas é desejável conhecimento básico em pelo menos uma linguagem de programação (ex: C#, Kotlin, Ruby, etc.) e framework (ex: .NET, SpringBoot, Rails, etc.)
Informações adicionais
Este processo seletivo contém as seguintes etapas:
Cadastro
Teste de Perfil
Histórico Acadêmico e Webinar Institucional
Teste de Lógica
Teste de Tecnologia
Entrevistas
Teste Situacional

Somos uma empresa do Grupo Visagio focada em desenvolver soluções digitais de alto impacto que transformam e evoluem o negócio de nossos clientes. Através de um ambiente de alta dinamicidade e engajamento com propósito, missão e cultura genuínos, buscamos pessoas apaixonadas por resolver problemas complexos por meio de inovação e tecnologia.

Aqui estamos comprometidos com a diversidade e inclusão em todas as áreas de nosso negócio. Valorizamos a diversidade de pensamento, perspectivas e experiências em nosso local de trabalho. Comprometemo-nos a criar um ambiente de trabalho inclusivo e justo para todos, independentemente de sua origem geográfica, raça, etnia, idade, gênero, orientação sexual, ou deficiência, para que possam contribuir com todo o seu potencial.

Se você busca realizar feitos grandiosos em um ambiente colaborativo e de crescimento acelerado, seu lugar é aqui!","['Computer science', 'Kanban', 'C#', '.NET', 'Databases', 'Machine learning', 'Scrum', 'Software development']"
